name: LineTime
description:
《Line Time》is a puzzle game based on “controlling the timeline”.

When playing the game，the player needs to move a ball to reach the goal. The ball has its own timeline, which includes five sorts of action：“up”、“down”、“left”、“right”and“stop”. Player can reorder the sequence of the actions，thus changing the motion of timeline，and finally move the ball to the terminal point.

There is also a conveyer in the game, running its own timeline as well as the ball. How to programme the conveyer’s actions needs to be deliberated. In the mid-late of the game, the player will control 2 balls, making them collide to each other so as to create extra shifting. It not only adds depth to the gameplay of 《Line Time》, but also a small test of the player's spatial imagination ability.
